name: Lamb and Winter Vegetable Stew
author: BJSCHADE
summary: A hearty stew made with winter vegetables. Definitely worth the time. Beef tips can be substituted for lamb.
ingredients: 2 cups peeled, seeded, and sliced butternut squash
directions: Heat the oil in a large saucepan, and brown the lamb meat on all sides
Drain fat, and stir in the beef broth and wine
Season with garlic, thyme, salt, pepper, and bay leaf
Bring the mixture to a boil
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer 20 minutes
Mix in the squash, parsnips, sweet potatoes, celery, and onion
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender
In a small bowl, blend the sour cream and flour
Gradually stir in 1/2 cup of the hot stew mixture
Stir the sour cream mixture into the saucepan
Remove the bay leaf, and continue to cook and stir until thickened
